kimononet.net.p2p

Interface Connection

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MulticastConnection, UDPConnection

    public interface Connection
    The interface represents a peer-to-peer connection. The implementation might be either state-full or state-less given the requirements for the connection.
    Author:
    Zorayr Khalapyan

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String BROADCAST_ADDRESS 
      static int DEFAULT_TIMEOUT
      Default timeout for receiving packets.
      static int MAX_PACKET_LENGTH
      Represents the maximum number of byte allowed in a packet.
      static java.lang.String WILDCARD_ADDRESS
      If the IP address is 0.0.0.0, the socket will be bound to the wildcard address, an IP address chosen by the kernel.
